abstracts.cdata!:
The restructuring of funds for the
            Cordoba Road Infrastructure Project in Argentina reflects
            changes in the following expected procedures: (a) a number
            of procedures from the first component on institutional
            strengthening will be cancelled and a series of other
            procedures will be included following the acquisition of IT
            equipment for Cordobas Supercentro and the hiring of a
            consultant; (b) actual resources for the execution of the
            second component on road rehabilitation and maintenance will
            increase as a result of automatic price redeterminations;
            and (c) the third component on road paving originally
            contemplated the execution of six (6) works will concern
            only five (5).
